rules_text:
Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5, note that number if you haven't yet.
When you note the fifth number for Stud Dealer, discard your hand, then draw five cards.
flavor_text: [i]“Tough luck, pal, but keep those hopes up. I betcha this hand turns it all around.”[/i]
